Toxicity: LC50) (96 hour) for American eel 5 ppb, mummichog 4-8 ppb, striped killifish 17 ppb, Atlantic silverside 13 ppb, striped mullet 100 ppb, bluehead 12 ppb, northern puffer 36 ppb, fathead minnow 28 ug/L, bluegill sunfish 13 ug/L, rainbow trout 17.7 ug/l, coho salmon 45.9 ug/L, chinook 7.5 ug/L, striped bass 10 ug/L, pumpkinseed 20 ug/l, and white perch 42 ug/L; LC50 (48 hour) for mosquito fish 36 ppb; LC50 (24 hour) for bluegill sunfish 260 ppb ... ; acute oral LD50 for rats is 38-67 mg/kg ... .
